sentences.en: A large portion of the cytoskeleton consists of threadlike microfilaments composed mainly of the contractile actin.
sentences.cn: 细胞骨架大部分由微丝组成,微丝主要由可收缩的肌动蛋白组成.

sentences.en: A slender, elongated, threadlike object or structure.
sentences.cn: 纤维一种细长的线状物体或组织。

sentences.en: Any of the threadlike filaments forming the mycelium of a fungus.
sentences.cn: 丝，丝状组织丝状的结构；细丝。

sentences.en: Genes are spiraled , threadlike particles made of DNA ( deoxyribonucleic acid ).
sentences.cn: 基因是由DNA ( 脱氧核糖核酸 ) 组成的丝状螺旋微粒.

sentences.en: Genes are spiraled, threadlike particles made of DNA (deoxyribonucleic acid).
sentences.cn: 基因是由DNA（脱氧核糖核酸）组成的丝状螺旋微粒。

sentences.en: North American orchid having a solitary leaf and flowers with threadlike petals.
sentences.cn: 北美洲的一种兰花,叶单生,花具有丝状反析花瓣.

sentences.en: The cook is grinding the carrot into threadlike thing.
sentences.cn: 厨师正在把胡萝卜磨成细丝。

sentences.en: The red threadlike filaments are composed of cool gas suspended by a magnetic field.
sentences.cn: 红色细长的丝状体是由冷却下来的气体组成，气体处于磁场中。

sentences.en: The vegetative part of a fungus, consisting of a mass of branching, threadlike hyphae.
sentences.cn: '菌丝'.''体真菌的营养体生殖部分, 由大量枝杈和''.'菌丝'. ''组成.

words.tran_cn: 线的；粘丝状的；纤维构成的；纤细的
线；螺纹；思路；衣服；线状物；玻璃纤维；路线
穿过；穿线于（thread的过去分词）
